post_title: HOFers - Cobb, Evers, Crawford etc and others
post_content:
Update — pics posted below. 
Please shoot me a pm with email address for better pics. 

Most of this is t206 so I’ll post it here.

Pending  - 1911-14 Brunners Bread D304 Chicago John Evers SGC 2            
Pending   - 1915 E106 American Caramel Eddie Collins PSA 4

Prefer ppff but g&s is fine as well


Trade for Piedmont 42/honest long cut t205 Cobb or off back t206 red Cobb.
